joining_transport_company.text:
ğŸš•ğŸ¢ Joining a transport company is an excellent opportunity for those who want to start a career as a taxi driver. By joining the company, you have access to a wide range of benefits and support.

To get started, you need to obtain a special taxi license, also known as a yellow card. This document confirms your qualifications and right to transport passengers. After this, you can start working on a company vehicle, which will allow you to quickly get into the rhythm and gain experience.

Joining a transport company will provide you with a stable flow of orders and clients, which will help you start earning money from the first days of work. In addition, you will have access to technical support and vehicle maintenance, which will allow you to save time and resources on its maintenance.

This opportunity is ideal for those who are looking for a stable and promising job in the transportation industry.ğŸš•ğŸ¢

work_through_fleet.text:
ğŸŒğŸš• Flotilla work is an alternative work option in the taxi industry, different from traditional work in a transport company.

In this case, you rent a car from a company specializing in taxi fleet rental. Every week you will have to pay car rental, fuel, fleet services and other related expenses.

The difference from working for a transport company is that you have full control over your work schedule and choose your own orders. You also pay all your own expenses, such as fuel and car washes, which can impact your profitability.

Working through a flotilla can be an attractive option for those who prefer greater independence and flexibility in their work, but are prepared to take on possible financial risks. This option is suitable for those who want to have full control over their business and are ready to organize their work independently. ğŸŒğŸš•
